name: Chicken & Rice
description: A healthy and delicious chicken-based meal for your dog.
consumptionAndStorage: Refer to your recipe in your Grublify package for serving sizes. Contact megan@grublify.com or mackenzie@grublify.com if you need portion sizes for your dog. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days or freeze portions for up to 1 month.
nutritionalInfo: Serving: XX | Calories: 1,034kcal | Protein: 143g | Fat: 31g |  Calcium: 1.5g | Zinc: 24mg | Iron: 12mg | Copper: 2.2mg | Iodine: 0.28mg | Vitamin A: 1250 IU | Vitamin D: 125 IU | Vitamin E: 50 IU | Vitamin B1: 2.8 mg | Vitamin B2: 3.9mg | Vitamin B12: 0.035mg

instructions: Optional: Rinse rice to remove excess starch.
Add chicken, rice, water, spinach, carrots, and eggs to the pressure cooker. Stir until evenly combined.
Pressure cook on high for 22 minutes with natural release or until chicken is tender.
Let the cooked ingredients cool (~5 min). Break up any large chunks of chicken.
Mix sardines, oil, and the nutrition pack in a separate bowl, then combine with the cooked ingredients.
Optional: Rinse rice to remove excess starch.
Add chicken, rice, water, spinach, carrots, and eggs to the Crockpot. Stir until evenly combined.
Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours or until chicken is tender.
Let the cooked ingredients cool (~5 min). Break up any large chunks of chicken.
Mix sardines, oil, and the nutrition pack in a separate bowl, then combine with the cooked ingredients.
Optional: Rinse rice to remove excess starch.
Boil water in a large pot and add rice. Cook until tender (~45 min).
In a separate pan, cook chicken until fully done. Add spinach and carrots to the pan and sauté.
Combine cooked rice, chicken, and vegetables in the pot. Stir well.
Mix sardines, oil, and the nutrition pack in a separate bowl, then combine with the cooked ingredients.

detailedInstructions.title: Preparation
text: Rinse the rice to remove excess starch. This step is optional but can help improve the texture of the rice. Gather all your ingredients: chicken, rice, water, spinach, carrots, and eggs.

detailedInstructions.title: Cooking
text: Pressure Cooker: Add all the ingredients to the pressure cooker and stir until evenly combined. Pressure cook on high for 13 minutes with natural release or until the chicken is tender.
Crockpot: Add all the ingredients to the crockpot and stir until evenly combined. Cook on low for 6–8 hours or high for 3–4 hours until the chicken is tender.

Stovetop: Boil water in a large pot and add rice. Cook until tender (about 15 minutes). In a separate pan, cook chicken until fully done, then sauté spinach and carrots with the chicken. Combine the cooked rice, chicken, and vegetables in the pot and stir well.

detailedInstructions.title: Cooling
text: Let the cooked ingredients cool for about 5 minutes. Break up any large chunks of chicken into smaller pieces to make them easier for your dog to eat.

detailedInstructions.title: Mixing
text: In a separate bowl, mix sardines, oil, and the nutrition pack. Combine this mixture with the cooked ingredients from your chosen method.

detailedInstructions.title: Serving
text: Measure out the appropriate serving size for your dog and feed the hungry doggo. 'Bone'- appétit!

detailedInstructions.title: Treating
text: Optional: Let your doggo lick the spoon!
